items.title: RESTful API with Laravel: Build a Real API with Laravel

visible_instructors.title: JuanD MeGon

items.headline: Build a RESTful API for a market system using Laravel and dominate the most challenging features of APIs with Laravel
objectives_summary: Create your own projects with Laravel (not only RESTful APIs)
Make the most of your work tools (Sublime Text 3, Git, Github, Composer, PHP artisan and Laravel)

items.title: Introduction to web programming for GIS applications
items.headline: Understanding web programming fundamentals focused on geospatial applications using Leaflet, Turf.js, and PostGIS
objectives_summary: Understand the basic technologies used in web programming and how they interact to form a web application. You will gain basic knowledge of HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, Bootstrap, PHP, AJAX, SQL, and the PostgreSQL database.  More specifically you will gain enough understanding of these technologies to be able to use Leaflet, Turf.js, and PostGIS  to create a web-mapping application that is freely available to all.

See how to rapidly build React apps; faster than you've ever built React web apps before!
Use and implement all of the major AWS services that are made available with Amplify
